document_data.caption: A map showing Agmoth Road passing south from Moranay.
document_data.name: Agmoth Road
document_data.mainbody:
'''Agmoth Road''' was a short road that connected the small town of [[Moranay]] with the [[Royal Road]] of [[Impiltur]] that spanned the length of the [[Easting Coast]].{{Cite dungeon/137/Man Forever}}

Traffic along the road was not very busy. However the road was used to convey shipments of [[gold]] and [[silver]] ore, from the mines of the [[Earthfast Mountains]] to the royal mint in the city of [[Hlammach]].
